title: FS or FT T211 Red Sun
author: t213

posts.post_title: FS or FT T211 Red Sun
posts.post_content:
They're now for sale or I'd like to trade these for:
D303
E104-1 (1910 caption or Nadja backs only)
T214
T216 Engle
T217

No paypal, check/mo please.
Thanks,
Andy

Available T211s (please review the scans, these generally display really well for the grades):
Bronkie SGC-20 SOLD
Erloff SGC-10 $325
Fisher SGC-20 $350
Lynch SGC-20 SOLD
Miller SGC-10 SOLD

posts.post_title: Red Sun backs are the best
posts.post_content:
These all have nice backs, which of course is what makes the Red Sun cards extra cool.  Good luck with the trading.

Brian
